about_the_game:
In 2593, the Russian Federation united all the planets of the solar system and nearby galaxies, discovering new worlds. The colonization of several hundred planets was only the beginning of a grandiose process. Based on the principles of interplanetary solidarity, the Union of Colonies was named the RFUP (Russian Federation of United Planets).


Thanks to the unique technologies developed on the basis of energy crystals discovered on the planet Manoan, the RFUP has grown into an intergalactic technological superpower. These crystals, which provided the country with an unprecedented leap in development, turned out to be the key to the greatest discoveries in the history of mankind.




In 2507, the planet Manoan was abandoned due to the depletion of its resources, but the legacy of these crystals lived on. Over time, RFUP scientists mastered the process of synthesizing energy crystals on space stations, opening up new horizons for research and technology development in the country and beyond. So the settlers from the Russian Federation began a new chapter in the history of space exploration, leaving a mark on every tiny star system they explored.

During the long-forgotten and lost centuries, when people went to the far reaches of space in search of new worlds, each colony sought to increase its population. To explore minerals and the suitability of planets for exploration, geological expeditions were sent to unexplored territories - desperate researchers who were ready to risk everything for the sake of what they wanted. One day, a young girl, Zlata, who has completed an internship on Mars and won the hearts of the scientific community with her knowledge, is sent on one of these daring outings.

Such expeditions were sent on small spaceships without weapons. The team consisted of a geologist pilot and a mechanized exoskeleton.


And so, in the very heart of the abode of ancient forces, where darkness is woven from timeless years, she hears the echoes of the SOS signal coming from the planet Manoan. This signal strikes her imagination, because the planet has been abandoned and uninhabited for fifty years according to all known archives of the Russian Federation. Having decided to take an amazing step into the unknown, Zlata is faced with mysteries that can turn all her beliefs and ideas about space upside down.



A distinctive feature of the game is its character leveling system, which allows players to experiment with different strategies and game styles. The combat system is based on the use of various types of weapons and magic, as well as on the competent use of the character's skills and abilities.





When scrolling the mouse wheel, you can switch between three different views: first-person, third-person, and top view.
This allows players to choose the most convenient angle for passing the game and viewing the game environment.





Two modes: "MECH Warrior" and "MECH Pilot".

In the "MECH Warrior" mode, the player controls a huge and powerful robot combat mech. The mech is equipped with weapons, armor and special abilities that allow it to fight enemies and complete various tasks. The player controls the movement of the mech, its attacks and special abilities.
In the "MECh Pilot" mode, the player can use his robot as a companion that helps in battles. The robot can attack enemies, protect its pilot and help him in various tasks. The ability to play as a pilot without being inside the robot. In this case, the player becomes a full-fledged participant in the fighting on earth and can use his weapons and abilities to destroy enemies.




An incredible adventure awaits you on the planet Manoan, where every step is filled with danger and mysteries. Your first task is to turn a geological exoskeleton into a powerful combat robot suit that can protect you from all threats.

After studying many types of weapons, from firearms to magic, you will be able to choose the right tool for each type of enemy. Magic crystals will surround you with magic, giving you the opportunity to use unique abilities in the fight against enemies.

Every riddle, every puzzle on your way will be a test of your intelligence and resourcefulness. By solving them, you will come closer to understanding the mysteries of the planet Manoan and its amazing secrets.

Faced with a difficult choice that will affect the outcome of the entire operation, you will have to weigh your decisions and take responsibility for every step of this dangerous journey. Your courage and ability to think on the move will become your main weapons in the fight for survival and victory.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: scenes of violence or brutality. Use weapons to fight enemies. Destroying enemies.

short_description: Try to survive today - This is a fast-paced hybrid three-dimensional first- and third-person action game with the ability to switch to an isometric camera. Control your MECH or attack enemies as Zlata!
